Uses of Package
bjpack

  • Classes in bjpack used by bjpack 
    Class and Description
    Card
    Card() - used to create card object for use within the game.
    Card.Rank
    Array of Enums for rank values.
    Card.Suit
    Array of Enums for suit values.
    Deck
    Deck() is used to create a 'deck' of Card() objects using an array.
    Game
    Game() holds most of Black's mechanics and generates most of the games elements for play.
    Hand
    Hand() is List() of Card() objects.
    Player
    Player() holds a Hand() object and ints for points and bet, as well as a String for the ending message, which states the win/loss/tie of that player.
